action_items: In order to develop an individualized care plan for your child/adolescent, a muldisciplinary assessment will be completed

Your child will be assessed by a team of individuals with experse in
adolescent development, and targeted violence prevenon

Yes
I agree to complete the P2P intake and screening forms
Yes
I agree to provide accurate information to the P2P team to aid in the assessment of my child/adolescent
Yes
I agree to follow the recommendations ofthe P2P team as outlined in the Individualized Care Plan
Yes
I agree to assist P2P in ongoing communication with community entities, including the school
Yes
I agree to meet with my mentor severaltimes per week
Yes
I agree to meet with my case manager on a weekly basis or as needed to acquire and maintain services in my community
Yes
I agree to notify the P2P team if my child/adolescent should demonstrate increasingly violentthoughts or behaviors and to contact
emergency personnel or authorities (call 911), should my child ever develop an intention or plan to injure him/herself or others
